General.Name: Pilot Gold Inc
General.Description: Pilot Gold Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties primarily in the United States and Turkey. The company primarily holds interests in the Kinsley Mountain property, a sediment-hosted gold property that consists of 513 claims on U.S. Bureau of Land Management land and 6 leased patents covering an area of 4,213 acres located in southeast Elko County, Nevada. It also holds interests in the TV Tower property, a gold-silver and porphyry copper-gold property located in the Biga District of northwestern Turkey; and the Halilaga property, a copper-gold porphyry deposit located in northwest Turkey. Pilot Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
